author: cbs8
title: 10 Best New-Car Deals For September 2015 By KBB.com
text:
Kelley Blue Book
Kelley Blue Book Ranks Best New-Car Deals Available During Model-Year Sell Down
IRVINE, Calif. , Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The experts from Kelley Blue Book www.kbb.com , the only vehicle valuation and information source trusted and relied upon by both consumers and the automotive industry, have assembled their list of the 10 best lease, financing and cash back deals for new cars available in September 2015 from a variety of auto manufacturers.
"September's list of exceptional lease and financing deals includes something for everyone, with options ranging from sedans and SUVs to electric and luxury models," said Jack R. Nerad , executive editorial director and executive market analyst for Kelley Blue Book's KBB.com. "Exceptional post- Labor Day deals are still available, and our list includes two offers of $5,000 cash back and a $159 -per-month lease deal."
Below are the KBB.com editors' picks for standout new-car lease, financing and cash back deals, all available at least through September 30, 2015 :

To see KBB.com's full coverage of the Best Car Deals of the Month, including editorial comments about each model, specific deal expiration dates, vehicle photography, pricing details and full editorial reviews, please visit http://www.kbb.com/car-reviews-and-news/top-10/best-car-deals/2 8547/ .
To discuss this topic or any other automotive-related information with a Kelley Blue Book analyst on-camera via the company's on-site studio, please contact a member of the Public Relations team to book an interview.
For more information and news from Kelley Blue Book's KBB.com, visit www.kbb.com/media/ , follow us on Twitter at www.twitter.com/kelleybluebook (or @kelleybluebook), like our page on Facebook at www.facebook.com/kbb , and get updates on Google+ at https://plus.google.com/+kbb .
About Kelley Blue Book ( www.kbb.com )
Founded in 1926, Kelley Blue Book, The Trusted Resource® , is the only vehicle valuation and information source trusted and relied upon by both consumers and the automotive industry. Each week the company provides the most market-reflective values in the industry on its top-rated website KBB.com, including its famous Blue Book® Trade-In Values and Fair Purchase Price, which reports what others are paying for new and used cars this week. The company also provides vehicle pricing and values through various products and services available to car dealers, auto manufacturers, finance and insurance companies, and governmental agencies. Kelley Blue Book's KBB.com ranked highest in its category for brand equity by the 2014 Harris Poll EquiTrend ® study and has been named Online Auto Shopping Brand of the Year for four consecutive years. Kelley Blue Book Co., Inc. is a Cox Automotive company.
